metadata.title: CVE-2017-8108 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Unspecified tests in Lynis before 2.5.0 allow local users to write toarbitrary files or possibly gain privileges via a symlink attack on atemporary file.

criterions.comment: lynis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
